content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GENERAL INFORMATION ON THE OPERATION OF THE SURVEILLANCE CAMERA SYSTEM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Name of operator:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" EPAM is responsible for the operation of the surveillance camera system. The surveillance camera system is operated by EPAM Hungary’s IT department.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Place of storage:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" EPAM stores camera recordings in its own systems and using its own devices.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Persons authorized to access\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Only the designated employees of EPAM may have access to the recordings. The date and purpose of each viewing, as well as the name of the persons viewing the recordings must be recorded in a protocol. The staff of EPAM Hungary’s IT department hold administrator rights for the system, however, they can grant, modify or terminate access rights solely with the consent of EPAM’s staff responsible for data processing. Persons authorized to access the camera recordings must take all necessary measures to prevent any unauthorized access to the recordings.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Purpose of use: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The system is intended to detect and prevent any unauthorized access to EPAM’s premises, any infringement or any attempt at the infringement of the property rights and damage to the assets of EPAM or its customers (including intellectual property and business secrets). EPAM operates the system for the protection of property and it is not intended for the direct surveillance of employees or for the use by EPAM of the recorded personal data for any other purpose.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use of recordings.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data transfer:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If during the storage period of the recordings any notice of an offence or an act endangering business secrets or assets is received, EPAM shall be entitled to refrain from deleting the relevant recordings and initiate the appropriate proceedings before the competent court or authority, and the recordings may be used as evidence in such proceedings. Any person whose rights or legitimate interests are affected by the recordings may also request during the storage period that EPAM refrain from the deletion of the relevant recording. In such cases, the recording must be archived and upon request promptly forwarded to the proceeding court or authority. If EPAM receives no such request within 30 (thirty) days of receipt of the request for the retention of the recording, the relevant recording must be deleted. All measures taken in this respect must be recorded in writing in the form of a protocol. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"INFORMATION ON SURVEILLED AREAS\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cameras at Entrances\\t\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[289,737]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Location:\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM has two cameras at each entrance – one outside of the entrance and one inside.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Budapest office has 5 floors and on each floor there are four entrances (total 40 cameras)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Szeged office has 5 floors and on each floor there is one entrance (total 10 cameras)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Debrecen office has one floor which has five entrances (total 10
